# selectItem(at:)

**Instance Method**

Selects the item in the menu at the specified index.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func selectItem(at index: Int)
```

## Parameters

- **index**: The index of the item you want to select, or `-1` you want to deselect all menu items.

## Related Documentation

- **indexOfSelectedItem**: The index of the item that was last selected by the user.

## Setting the current selection

- **select(_:)**: Selects the specified menu item.
- **selectItem(withTag:)**: Selects the menu item with the specified tag.
- **selectItem(withTitle:)**: Selects the item with the specified title.
